text: Manthrikante Pravukal is a 1994 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Vijayakrishnan, starring Madhu and Shivaji in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Madhu * Anil Lale * Arya * Devi * Kanakalatha * Master Prasanth * Shivaji ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Manthrikante Pravukal
